title: startup tech lawyer
original_prompt: I will ask of you to prepare a 1 page draft of a design partner agreement between a tech startup with IP and a potential client of that startup's technology that provides data and domain expertise to the problem space the startup is solving. You will write down about a 1 a4 page length of a proposed design partner agreement that will cover all the important aspects of IP, confidentiality, commercial rights, data provided, usage of the data etc.
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "dimension1": [
            "design partner agreement",
            "draft",
            "1 page",

}
```
input1: The tech startup, InnovateTech, specializes in developing AI-driven solutions for healthcare data analysis. They have developed proprietary algorithms and software that can significantly improve patient outcomes by predicting health risks. InnovateTech is seeking a design partner agreement with HealthCorp, a leading healthcare provider that has extensive data on patient demographics and treatment outcomes. The agreement should address the ownership of the intellectual property generated during the collaboration, confidentiality of the data shared, commercial rights to the developed solutions, and the specific types of data HealthCorp will provide, including patient records and treatment protocols, as well as how this data can be utilized in the development process.
input2: GreenEnergy Solutions, a tech startup focused on renewable energy technologies, has created a unique platform that optimizes energy consumption for commercial buildings. They are looking to enter into a design partner agreement with EcoBuild, a construction firm that specializes in sustainable building practices and has access to a wealth of data on energy usage patterns in various building types. The agreement should outline the intellectual property rights related to the software and any new technologies developed, ensure confidentiality regarding EcoBuild's proprietary data, define the commercial rights for both parties, specify the types of data EcoBuild will provide, such as energy consumption metrics and building specifications, and clarify how this data can be used to enhance the platform's capabilities.
input1_ans:
**Design Partner Agreement**

**This Design Partner Agreement ("Agreement") is made and entered into as of [Date] by and between InnovateTech, a [State] corporation with its principal place of business at [Address] ("InnovateTech"), and HealthCorp, a [State] corporation with its principal place of business at [Address] ("HealthCorp").**

**1. Purpose**  
The purpose of this Agreement is to establish a collaborative relationship between InnovateTech and HealthCorp to develop AI-driven solutions for healthcare data analysis, leveraging HealthCorp's extensive data and domain expertise.

**2. Data Provision**  
HealthCorp agrees to provide InnovateTech with access to specific datasets, including but not limited to patient demographics, treatment outcomes, patient records, and treatment protocols ("HealthCorp Data"). HealthCorp warrants that it has the necessary rights to share this data and that it complies with all applicable laws and regulations regarding data privacy and protection.

**3. Confidentiality**  
Both parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of any proprietary or confidential information exchanged during the collaboration, including but not limited to HealthCorp Data and InnovateTech's proprietary algorithms and software ("Confidential Information"). Confidential Information shall not be disclosed to any third party without prior written consent from the disclosing party, except as required by law.

**4. Intellectual Property Ownership**  
InnovateTech shall retain all rights, title, and interest in and to its pre-existing intellectual property, including any proprietary algorithms and software. Any new intellectual property developed jointly during the collaboration ("Joint IP") shall be owned jointly by InnovateTech and HealthCorp. The parties agree to negotiate in good faith the terms of a separate agreement regarding the commercialization and licensing of Joint IP.

**5. Commercial Rights**  
InnovateTech shall have the exclusive right to commercialize the solutions developed under this Agreement. HealthCorp shall have a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use the developed solutions for its internal purposes. Any revenue generated from the commercialization of the developed solutions shall be shared as mutually agreed upon in a separate agreement.

**6. Data Usage**  
InnovateTech agrees to use HealthCorp Data solely for the purpose of developing and testing the AI-driven solutions. InnovateTech shall not use the HealthCorp Data for any other purpose without prior written consent from HealthCorp. InnovateTech shall implement appropriate security measures to protect the HealthCorp Data from unauthorized access or disclosure.

**7. Term and Termination**  
This Agreement shall commence on the date first written above and shall continue for a period of [Duration] unless terminated by either party upon [Notice Period] written notice. Upon termination, InnovateTech shall return or destroy all HealthCorp Data in its possession and certify such destruction in writing.

**8. Governing Law**  
This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of [State], without regard to its conflict of law principles.

**9. Entire Agreement**  
This Agreement constitutes the entire understanding between the parties regarding the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior agreements, understandings, and negotiations, whether written or oral.

**IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have executed this Design Partner Agreement as of the date first above written.**

**InnovateTech**  
By: ___________________________  
Name: [Name]  
Title: [Title]  
Date: [Date]  

**HealthCorp**  
By: ___________________________  
Name: [Name]  
Title: [Title]  
Date: [Date]

**Design Partner Agreement**

**This Design Partner Agreement ("Agreement") is made and entered into as of [Date] by and between InnovateTech, a tech startup specializing in AI-driven solutions for healthcare data analysis ("InnovateTech"), and HealthCorp, a leading healthcare provider ("HealthCorp").**

**1. Purpose**  
The purpose of this Agreement is to establish a collaborative partnership between InnovateTech and HealthCorp to develop innovative healthcare solutions utilizing HealthCorp's extensive patient data and InnovateTech's proprietary algorithms.

**2. Intellectual Property**  
All intellectual property (IP) generated during the collaboration, including but not limited to algorithms, software, and any related inventions, shall be owned by InnovateTech. HealthCorp shall have a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use the developed solutions for internal purposes.

**3. Confidentiality**  
Both parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of all proprietary information and data shared during the collaboration. This includes, but is not limited to, patient records, treatment protocols, and any other sensitive information. Confidential information shall not be disclosed to any third parties without prior written consent from the disclosing party.

**4. Commercial Rights**  
InnovateTech retains all commercial rights to the solutions developed under this Agreement. HealthCorp may not sell or distribute the developed solutions without InnovateTech's prior written consent.

**5. Data Provided**  
HealthCorp agrees to provide InnovateTech with access to specific types of data necessary for the development process, including but not limited to:
   - Patient demographics
   - Treatment outcomes
   - Patient records
   - Treatment protocols

**6. Usage of Data**  
The data provided by HealthCorp shall be used solely for the purpose of developing and refining the AI-driven solutions. InnovateTech agrees to implement appropriate measures to ensure the data is used in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations regarding patient privacy and data protection.

**7. Important Aspects**  
Both parties acknowledge the importance of collaboration and agree to communicate openly regarding project progress, challenges, and any necessary adjustments to the scope of work.

**8. Legal Terms**  
This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of [State/Country]. Any disputes arising from this Agreement shall be resolved through mediation, and if unsuccessful, through arbitration.

**9. Obligations**  
Each party agrees to fulfill its obligations as outlined in this Agreement and to act in good faith to achieve the objectives of the collaboration.

**10. Rights and Responsibilities**  
Both parties shall have the right to terminate this Agreement with [number] days written notice if either party fails to comply with the terms outlined herein.

**IN WITNESS WHEREOF**, the parties hereto have executed this Design Partner Agreement as of the date first above written.

**InnovateTech**  
By: ___________________________  
Name: [Name]  
Title: [Title]  
Date: [Date]  

**HealthCorp**  
By: ___________________________  
Name: [Name]  
Title: [Title]  
Date: [Date]  

---

This one-page design partner agreement outlines the essential terms and conditions for the collaboration between InnovateTech and HealthCorp, ensuring clarity on intellectual property, confidentiality, commercial rights, and data usage.
input2_ans:
**Design Partner Agreement**

**This Design Partner Agreement ("Agreement") is made and entered into as of [Date], by and between GreenEnergy Solutions, a [State] corporation with its principal place of business at [Address] ("GreenEnergy"), and EcoBuild, a [State] corporation with its principal place of business at [Address] ("EcoBuild").**

**1. Purpose**  
The purpose of this Agreement is to establish a collaborative relationship between GreenEnergy and EcoBuild to enhance GreenEnergy's renewable energy optimization platform through EcoBuild's data and domain expertise in sustainable building practices.

**2. Intellectual Property Rights**  
a. **Existing IP**: Each party retains all rights, title, and interest in and to its respective pre-existing intellectual property.  
b. **Developed IP**: Any new technologies, software, or enhancements developed as a result of this collaboration shall be jointly owned by both parties, unless otherwise agreed in writing. Each party shall have the right to use such jointly developed IP for its own purposes, subject to the terms of this Agreement.

**3. Confidentiality**  
a. **Confidential Information**: Each party agrees to keep confidential all proprietary information disclosed by the other party, including but not limited to business plans, technical data, and any data provided under this Agreement ("Confidential Information").  
b. **Obligations**: The receiving party shall not disclose Confidential Information to any third party without the prior written consent of the disclosing party and shall use the Confidential Information solely for the purposes of this Agreement.  
c. **Exclusions**: Confidential Information does not include information that is publicly available, independently developed by the receiving party, or disclosed under the order of a court or governmental authority.

**4. Data Provision and Usage**  
a. **Data Provided**: EcoBuild agrees to provide GreenEnergy with access to relevant data, including but not limited to energy consumption metrics, building specifications, and historical energy usage patterns ("Provided Data").  
b. **Usage of Data**: GreenEnergy may use the Provided Data solely for the purpose of enhancing its platform's capabilities and optimizing energy consumption solutions. GreenEnergy shall not use the Provided Data for any other purpose without EcoBuild's prior written consent.

**5. Commercial Rights**  
a. **Licensing**: Upon successful development and testing of the enhanced platform, GreenEnergy shall have the right to commercialize the platform and any associated technologies.  
b. **Revenue Sharing**: In the event that the enhanced platform generates revenue, the parties agree to negotiate in good faith a revenue-sharing model that reflects their respective contributions to the development of the platform.

**6. Term and Termination**  
a. **Term**: This Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and continue for a period of [X years], unless terminated earlier in accordance with this Agreement.  
b. **Termination**: Either party may terminate this Agreement upon [30] days' written notice to the other party. Upon termination, each party shall return or destroy all Confidential Information of the other party.

**7. Governing Law**  
This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of [State], without regard to its conflict of law principles.

**8. Entire Agreement**  
This Agreement constitutes the entire understanding between the parties regarding the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior agreements and understandings, whether written or oral.

**IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have executed this Design Partner Agreement as of the date first above written.**

**GreenEnergy Solutions**  
By: ___________________________  
Name: [Name]  
Title: [Title]  
Date: [Date]  

**EcoBuild**  
By: ___________________________  
Name: [Name]  
Title: [Title]  
Date: [Date]  

---

This draft serves as a foundational template for a design partner agreement, and it is advisable for both parties to seek legal counsel to ensure compliance with applicable laws and to address any specific needs or concerns.

**Design Partner Agreement**

**This Design Partner Agreement ("Agreement") is made and entered into as of [Date] by and between GreenEnergy Solutions ("Tech Startup"), a company focused on renewable energy technologies, and EcoBuild ("Construction Firm"), a company specializing in sustainable building practices.**

**1. Purpose**  
The purpose of this Agreement is to establish a collaborative partnership between Tech Startup and Construction Firm to enhance the development of Tech Startup's energy optimization platform through the utilization of Construction Firm's data and expertise.

**2. Intellectual Property Rights**  
2.1 All intellectual property rights related to the existing software and technologies developed by Tech Startup prior to this Agreement shall remain the sole property of Tech Startup.  
2.2 Any new technologies or software developed jointly during the term of this Agreement shall be co-owned by both parties, with specific terms for usage and commercialization to be defined in a separate document.

**3. Confidentiality**  
3.1 Both parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of proprietary information shared during the collaboration.  
3.2 Construction Firm's data, including but not limited to energy consumption metrics and building specifications, shall be treated as confidential and shall not be disclosed to any third parties without prior written consent.

**4. Commercial Rights**  
4.1 Each party shall retain the commercial rights to their respective technologies and data.  
4.2 The parties agree to negotiate in good faith the terms of any commercial agreements that may arise from the collaboration, including revenue sharing and licensing agreements.

**5. Data Provision**  
5.1 Construction Firm agrees to provide Tech Startup with access to relevant data, including energy consumption metrics, building specifications, and any other data necessary for the enhancement of the platform's capabilities.  
5.2 The data provided shall be used solely for the purpose of improving the platform and shall not be utilized for any other purpose without prior consent from Construction Firm.

**6. Usage of Data**  
6.1 Tech Startup may use the data provided by Construction Firm to enhance the platform's capabilities, including but not limited to optimizing energy consumption and improving user experience.  
6.2 Any analysis or results derived from the data shall be shared with Construction Firm for review and feedback.

**7. Important Aspects**  
7.1 This Agreement outlines the key legal terms, obligations, rights, and responsibilities of both parties in relation to the collaboration.  
7.2 Both parties agree to meet regularly to discuss progress, address any issues, and ensure alignment on project goals.

**8. Term and Termination**  
8.1 This Agreement shall commence on the date first written above and shall continue until terminated by either party with [30] days written notice.  
8.2 Upon termination, all confidential information shall be returned or destroyed, and any ongoing obligations regarding intellectual property and confidentiality shall survive.

**IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have executed this Design Partner Agreement as of the date first above written.**

**GreenEnergy Solutions**  
By: ___________________________  
Name: [Name]  
Title: [Title]  
Date: [Date]  

**EcoBuild**  
By: ___________________________  
Name: [Name]  
Title: [Title]  
Date: [Date]
